legal_basis: sections 20(1)(a)-(d) and 20(2) of the Access to Information Act
standard_of_review: judicial review under the Federal Court Act
decision_reasoning: failure to meet legal standard for exemption
result_of_case: partial exemption for specific pricing data and legal opinions
disclosure of majority of requested records
cause_of_action: request for disclosure of documents related to privatization and sale of CCG
procedure_followed: burden of proof on Applicant to demonstrate exemptions
